description: A cybercriminal gang that researchers track as Revolver Rabbit has registered more than 500,000 domain names for infostealer campaigns that target Windows and macOS systems. [...]
title: Revolver Rabbit gang registers 500,000 domains for malware campaigns

description: SolarWinds has fixed eight critical vulnerabilities in its Access Rights Manager (ARM) software, six of which allowed attackers to gain remote code execution (RCE) on vulnerable devices. [...]
title: SolarWinds fixes 8 critical bugs in access rights audit software

description: Microsoft has fixed a known issue preventing the Microsoft Photos app from starting on some Windows 11 22H2 and 23H2 systems. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes bug blocking Windows 11 Photos from starting

description: Cisco has fixed a critical severity vulnerability that lets attackers add new users with root privileges and permanently crash Security Email Gateway (SEG) appliances using emails with malicious attachments. [...]
title: Critical Cisco bug lets hackers add root users on SEG devices

description: Microsoft says the Windows 11 2023 Update has entered the broad deployment phase and is now available to all seekers on eligible systems. [...]
title: Microsoft: Windows 11 23H2 now available for all eligible devices
